scripts.sort-bin: mkdir -p ./bin/linux && mkdir -p ./bin/macos && mkdir -p ./bin/win && mv ./bin/builderbuilder-linux ./bin/linux/builderbuilder && mv ./bin/builderbuilder-macos ./bin/macos/builderbuilder && mv ./bin/builderbuilder-win.exe ./bin/win/builderbuilder.exe
scripts.package: rm -rf ./bin && pkg --target node16-linux,node16-macos,node16-win --out-path ./bin --no-bytecode . && npm run sort-bin
